Articles.Content: I Sparta \*push\* you off the hill. My hill.

I fling a bunch of goats onto the hill, knocking you off.

My hill with a bunch of flung goats on it.

I fling myself onto the hill, and the goats begin worshipping me as a sort of magical flying god.

My holy hill.

I RPG-bombed you.

My hill.

I use a mind control device to make the goats believe you are a tasty snack and should be consumed immediately.

I then eradicate the goats that just brutally murdered you and build a bunker 5 miles under the hill.

My blood-stained hill.

i release a chaos sorcerers in to your bunker. he then kills you with the power of the warp. after he's finished i lock him back up in a stasis field and have him teleported to The Rock for interrogation.

my hill for once.

One of my experimental rail guns "accidentally misfires"

My hill.

I construct a rather crude house on the hill. Due to complex rules on The Hill server, the hill is now legally mine and no longer owned by anyone else.

My crude house on the hill.

I controlled the server but sat by and watched.

Still Tery215's hill.

I continue to own the hill, also I have ravenous dogs of Hades now.

My evil hill with a crude house.

Through the server I E.M.P.'ed Tery215 and the Hades.

No one's hill.

*Standby for temporal flux*

....

*Commence restoration.*

Time and space shimmer and ripple, and the hill is revitalized to its pristine state. No more nuclear waste, no more unexploded bombs. 

Just a clean grassy and attractive hill with a few trees, a flagpole, and a picnic bench on top. Partway down it is a crater from an ancient war. 

A new flag is raised atop this hill- the moderators flag.
I plant the Flag of Divine Glory next to the moderators' flag.

I firebombed both of you and burnt the flags with it. Then I need to land somewhere.

No one's hill, because I haven't claim it.

I spend days preparing to invade the hill with an army of ninjas and I go to invade the hill only to figure out that it was abandoned. I build a bomb proof laboratory on the hill.

My hill.

PS: I have a new forum signature!

Bombproof sure, but what happens if someone drills a tunnel beneath it? All of the pilings are undermined, and it collapses with you still inside. 

I hike up the hill and put my flag back on top where it belongs. All intruders will be met with flying lead and a 2 mile effective range.

Some dude up in space fires a SINGLE hypergamma ray at you. After seeing a slowly advancing gamma ray burning through the atmosphere directly towards you, you run away in terror.

I wait for the gamma ray to pass through the hill and claim it for myself and some dude.

I kinetically bombard you, some dude and the hill, rebuild the hill out of black bricks, trap it to an asteroid and throw it into the asteroid belt.

My hill.

I use the Asteroid Call command like on spore to create a large, asteroid shaped hill.. The planet, however, is a flaming wreckage.

My hill.

I turn the time back to April 2012.

No one's hill.

Is it just me, or does that look like an unclaimed hill over there?

My hill.

I sever your jugular and use a Matter Replicator to make hundreds of copies of your dead body, which I use to build human walls around the hill. 

My hill.

due to the newly created complex timeline of hills of the future existing in the past before they were created they merge with the new hill making a massive hill with my reset system installed.then i put a small house surrounded by four trees and a flagpole that rises far above the tree line. \*save\*

vexx32 massive home like hill.

Because the time was turned back to April 2012 , I am still alive. I take the hill and delete toolofdarkness's save .

My hill.

Due to Some Dude existing in 4 space, he is a baby.

He spits on you and you run away, afraid.

My hill.
